findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%).

findings.title: ULTW - Unlimited Liquidity to Team Wallet
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer funds to the team wallet.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: There are segments that contain unused state variables.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Functions that are not used in the contract, and make the code's size bigger.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: Abusable owner functions
findings.description: Functions can be abused by the owner, such as manipulating fees, transferring funds to the team's wallet, blacklisting contracts, and stopping transactions.

findings.title: Lack of multi-wallet signing pattern
findings.description: The absence of a multi-wallet signing pattern makes the contract vulnerable to potential hacks.
